DataElement.preferredName: NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2011 Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Past Week Distress over Other Problem Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how distressed they have been during the past week over other problems not already included or mentioned in the list, using a free text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2011 Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Past Week Distress over Other Problem
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient problems in five categories._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's distress related to other problems not included in the list.

ObjectClass.preferredName: NCCN Guidelines Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Version 1.2011
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient problems in five categories.

Concepts.longName: NCCN Guidelines Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Version 1.2011
Concepts.definition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient problems in five categories.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Distress over Other Problem
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about an individual's distress related to other problems not included in the list.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's distress related to other problems not included in the list.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NHC for study in Rave per request by G.Hartley-Deen. mc 6/27/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
